caption.p: A) Sequence alignment for the amino acids between the 2019‐nCoV RdRp and the SARS‐CoV RdRp. Conserved (pink arrows) and nonconserved (black arrows) mutations are highlighted. Gray: hydrophobic aliphatic, orange: neutral aromatic, yellow: thiol and sulfide, green: hydroxy, red: basic, blue: carboxylic acid, brown: primary amide, pink: proline. B) Crystal structure of the SARS‐CoV RdRp active site (PDB ID: 6NUS).
